data.text:
Mariani Climate Summary

Located at an elevation of None meters (0 feet) above sea level, Mariani has a Humid subtropical, dry winter climate (Classification: Cwa). The district’s yearly temperature is 25.67ºC (78.21ºF) and it is -0.3% lower than India’s averages. Mariani typically receives about 96.46 millimeters (3.8 inches) of precipitation and has 66.44 rainy days (18.2% of the time) annually.
